data.text:
@opinionated75 @BonnieLCarter I might be a bit late with this but get some electrolytes into you...especially Potassium.

Your muscles will thank you for it 🙂

@opinionated75 Oh no! Hey my daughter did a combo of Advil and Tylenol and that got her thru Covid.
Get better soon! xox
@opinionated75 Lots of rest and fluids…feel better soon! Hopefully your husband is home and can tag in as head parent while you recover. Keep us posted.
@buddysboo @opinionated75 Oh wow. I'll be floating out here on an ark yet if I get covid then. https://t.co/Pu42agzX4v
@foxoverhedgehog @opinionated75 At first, I thought the same, but they were SOOOO much worse....
@buddysboo @opinionated75 Im not sure I'd be able to distinguish that from menopause symptoms.
@opinionated75 Oh shiiiiiiit! Im so sorry. Hoping it's just a very mild case and you recover quickly.

@opinionated75 omicron is getting everybody. The weirdest thing I had from it (and didn't even realize it was a symptom until looking it up) was NIGHT SWEATS. No fever, just sweating like hell at night.
@opinionated75 I’m so sorry. Take good care.
@opinionated75 Ack. I hope you feel better soon!
